source_objects.title: Database Design & Development
source_objects.description: Become a database expert with these courses ranging from basic SQL to Hadoop and Oracle mastery.

items.title: SQL Server: The 28 hour Masterclass course (9 courses in 1)

visible_instructors.name: O.Thuillier | SQL | Postgres | Powershell| MySQL | Python | TSQL
visible_instructors.job_title: Join the masterclass SQL Server course !
visible_instructors.title: O.Thuillier | SQL | Postgres | Powershell| MySQL | Python | TSQL Administration,TSQL, and SQL Server performance.
visible_instructors.display_name: O.Thuillier | SQL | Postgres | Powershell| MySQL | Python | TSQL Administration,TSQL, and SQL Server performance.

items.headline: Learn how to become a future developer, or either a future DBA, or a performance expert on SQL Server with 80 exercices!
objectives_summary: Learn the SQL language from A to Z (10 hours of lessons).
To administer an SQL server ( 13 hours of lessons ).
Greatly improve the performance of your SQL Server engine  ( 4 hours of lessons ).

items.headline: Learn everything about PostgreSQL Architecture, Log Management, Routine Maintenance, Security and System Administration
objectives_summary: Key concepts and various features of PostgreSQL
Get hands-on by installing and configuring PostgreSQL server
PostgreSQL Architecture and various processes

items.title: SQL with PostgreSQL for Beginners: Analyze | Manipulate Data

objectives_summary: Create  Database and Table
Insert data into database
Retrieve data from database

items.title: Backup and Restore Fundamentals in PostgreSQL DB - Level 2
items.headline: Certified PostgreSQL ( Postgres ) Database Backup and Recovery Professional
objectives_summary: Practical exposure on backup and restore techniques in PostgreSQL Database
The best part is that every concept and techniques explained are supported by a hands on demo session
Source codes / scripts for performing backup and restoration tasks

items.title: Learning Path: OpenCV: Real-Time Computer Vision with OpenCV
items.headline: Harness the power of OpenCV 3 to build practical computer vision projects
objectives_summary: Learn about the computer vision workflows and understand the basic image matrix format and filters
Understand the segmentation and feature extraction techniques
Learn how to remove backgrounds from a static scene to identify moving objects for video surveillance

items.title: MongoDB: Learn Administration and Security in MongoDB
items.headline: Complete guide for sharding, administration and security in MongoDB
objectives_summary: Understand Sharding , Mechanisms and Types
Explore the components of a sharded cluster
Learn about the architecture of a sharded cluster

items.title: Point of Sale (POS) System

visible_instructors.name: Hemn Barzan
visible_instructors.job_title: Softewar  Architect, Developer, Database, NoSQL, SQL Server
visible_instructors.title: Hemn Barzan Abdalla

items.headline: •Learn how to use a database for creating the Customer Database - POS Point of Sale System
objectives_summary: You can analyze sales data, figure out how well all the items on your shelves sell, and adjust purchasing levels accordingly.
Keep track of your daily cash flow, Monitor all cash register adjustments and staff changes throughout the day.
You can maintain a sales history to help adjust your buying decisions for seasonal purchasing trends.

objectives_summary: Use more advanced concepts and functionality in Oracle SQL to write and improve their queries.
